name: Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword
name_original: Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword
description: Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword is a video game based on the Tomb Raider series, developed by Core Design and published by Activision under license from Eidos Interactive. It was released for the Game Boy Color in 2001, and it is a sequel to the first Tomb Raider for the same system. The next Tomb Raider game for a handheld system was Tomb Raider: The Prophecy for the Game Boy Advance.
